meanings.definition: Obtain or secure (something desired or beneficial)
meanings.sent1: She gained a new friend at school.
meanings.sent2: He gained knowledge from reading books.
meanings.sent3: The cat gained the attention of everyone by dancing.
meanings.sent4: The team gained victory after a hard-fought match.
meanings.sent5: The plant gained strength from the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Increase in amount, size, or value
meanings.sent1: The company gained more customers this year.
meanings.sent2: The population of the city gained rapidly.
meanings.sent3: The balloon gained size as more air was blown into it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile gained value in his eyes over time.
meanings.sent5: The excitement gained in the room as the show started.

meanings.definition: Acquire or develop (a skill, quality, or attribute)
meanings.sent1: He gained proficiency in playing the guitar.
meanings.sent2: She gained confidence after practicing public speaking.
meanings.sent3: The robot gained a sense of humor after a software update.
meanings.sent4: His reputation gained respect among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The painting gained beauty with each brushstroke.
